data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Eidhxs2fGfsQ7kNvgGtKByd&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYABAL2mGRhcVS2Ts14VQTnq3nNf8Amhk1FP2jmAe2W10w&oe=66D5A21C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=1ic4rKEAfAUQ7kNvgHId_R6&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCBv_rlcSVvvXml-WboHMgFRg0cORO__FNc82SbCBUfQQ&oe=66D5ABA4)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=pVYvL6bZfP8Q7kNvgG7jBPA&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDjY4byvHtwZHlTJgOw6tk3CUaNMSxWCOCq4MJ9lPoDUA&oe=66D59307)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=aTV8fplW-zUQ7kNvgGNwvtd&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBOxo8Q4O5AIxb3gTvdm11fRvZ4yawMFtMk2kNFcjWAng&oe=66D585E6)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=J7HIEVmPMvUQ7kNvgGm_kYm&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD7jK1WuhbBP203KZFEiO7sw3Wf2BUf5vv7pxDRLHvfMA&oe=66D5B258)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=fJGSatawcLsQ7kNvgGLUB_T&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAg4b12YvJDCq7AH4y1B4wDPUHITYhCYsKZ-3JdayREwg&oe=66D5AED9)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=D2FTFmVG7bAQ7kNvgFD7Qh9&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAV2EM-QFNqfMVu_DgVf3_tiFJpyC0LdCQsevHH-xNlXw&oe=66D594F0)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=6KoJIZR8XoAQ7kNvgFImK0e&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCKNRCQfvpa2zRlwTorMjD4ZInh3la6rFEmRKXRmSGwyg&oe=66D57F6A)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=15bwOLhN2JUQ7kNvgFJYXTt&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAwMCzK-MWr2CzNpVP4FUWs-8sQoGaORaqBWNNjnwfmfw&oe=66D59317)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=s6A20wTuNW8Q7kNvgF9AS8A&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDTcCy5CVIZugyU3QEzSKuEagdRRtKkF4ldJlk-Sn5ZOg&oe=66D5AE8C)
